short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for swift access to hunt MRR.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MRRhunt is your one-stop shop for swiftly hunting down Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) insights and much more! Why juggle between multiple sites when you can access Google, Whois, Semrush, Builtwith, Similarweb, and ProductHunt all from one place? Whether you're a SaaS enthusiast, a curious browser, or a digital marketer, MRRhunt gives you the power to fetch quick insights about any domain. It's like having a Swiss Army knife for the digital age. Dive in and hunt down those insights!
